name: Click Towards the Cure
description:
The fight against cancer needs all the help it can get!  In this program, you are specifically working on LEUKEMIA - raising funds, researching treatments, and saving lives! 

How to Play

Click the Ribbon

Click the ribbon for a chance to save lives! Fundraise by clicking houses to solicit donations!

Invest in Financial Services:

Raise more money for the cause!

Invest in Care: 

Give patients with Leukemia the best treatment available!

Invest in Research: 

Fund life changing research on the battle against Leukemia

Thanks for Playing!
